sentences.sentence: OpinionOpinion|Jun 25, 2021
No matter where I go in Colorado, I meet parents who are working incredibly hard ᅳ two or three mes of 96% of Colorado families to help cover the growing cost of raising kids.

In March, President Joe Biden signed the American Rescue Plan into law, which included my proposal to significantly expand the Child Tax Credit ᅳ essentially offering all low- and middle-income families a tax cut in the form of regular, monthly payments.
If you're a parent, chances are high that you're eligible to receive this extra income this year ᅳ starting in July.

The improved Child Tax Credit will give families an income boost of aas much as $3,000 per year for each qualifying child between the ages of 6 and 17 and as much as $3,600 per year for each qualifying child younger than the age of 6.
On July 15, most families will receive their first payment (as much as $250 per child younger than 6 and as much as $300 per child age 6-17).
This will continue on or around the 15th of the month in

documents.result_message: Our detector is highly confident that the text is written entirely by a human.
documents.inputText:
OpinionOpinion|Jun 25, 2021
No matter where I go in Colorado, I meet parents who are working incredibly hard — two or three mes of 96% of Colorado families to help cover the growing cost of raising kids. In March, President Joe Biden signed the American Rescue Plan into law, which included my proposal to significantly expand the Child Tax Credit — essentially offering all low- and middle-income families a tax cut in the form of regular, monthly payments.
If you’re a parent, chances are high that you’re eligible to receive this extra income this year — starting in July.
The improved Child Tax Credit will give families an income boost of aas much as $3,000 per year for each qualifying child between the ages of 6 and 17 and as much as $3,600 per year for each qualifying child younger than the age of 6. On July 15, most families will receive their first payment (as much as $250 per child younger than 6 and as much as $300 per child age 6-17). This will continue on or around the 15th of the month in
